report_title: KJET Elgeyo Marakwet County Application Ranking and Evaluation

S1_Registration_Track_Record_5%.reason: PLC, Registered since 2009 (>3 yrs), strong governance/board (34% women).

S2_Financial_Position_20%.reason: Turnover KES 152.3M (2024), strong positive trend, audited financials (T>100M).

S3_Market_Demand_Competitiveness_20%.reason: Multi-product (pasteurized, yogurt, lala), regional sales, strong B2C/B2B market position.

S4_Business_Proposal_Viability_25%.reason: Clear plan for solar-powered processing, ERP systems, quantified targets (12,000L/day).

S5_Value_Chain_Alignment_10%.reason: Priority VC (Dairy), critical node (processing/value addition), farmer-centric model.

S6_Inclusivity_Sustainability_20%.reason: 34% women board, solar heating, water preheating, climate-smart innovations.

S6_Inclusivity_Sustainability_20%.reason: Solar power use planned, waste management, water usage reduction.
